dc:oaiDcType.dc:title: Data and code for: Behavioral Constraints on the Design of Subgame-Perfect Implementation Mechanisms

dc:oaiDcType.dc:description: These files contain the analysis code, data, experimental code, and experimental instructions for the journal article "Behavioral Constraints on the Design of Subgame-Perfect Implementation Mechanisms," American Economic Review.
